name: King's Dungeon: Pigs attack
description:
In the Dungeon of the King is a fuss !!!
Pigs want to make a mess out there and steal gold!

The king is scared to melee, and launches a bomb into the pigs.
Aim the bomb at the desired target. The number of bombs per level is limited.

In the store you can pump the feeling of the impact.

P.S. There are very difficult levels, do not break your device, I tried :)
